title: Auto sales muted as extreme heatwave cools demand in July
description: Vehicle registrations in June were nearly flat, up just 0.73% from the previous year, with 1,895,552 units registered. Extreme heatwaves and delayed monsoons dampened retail sales, notably impacting two-wheelers and passenger vehicles. Despite optimistic forecasts for the monsoon season, the auto industry faces challenges, including high inventory levels and subdued market sentiment.
